text: E duniyara jibane ya kichu byaya kara haya, tara tulana halo jharo ha'oyara mato, yate rayeche tusarera saitya, ya se jatira sasyaksetre giye legeche yara nijera jan'ya manda kareche. Atahpara seguloke nihsesa kare diyeche. Bastutah allaha tadera upara kona an'yaya karenani, kintu tara nijera'i nijedera upara atyacara karachila.
